document.heading: Fiscal Year 1999 Budget Support Temporary Amendment Act of 1998

history.narrative: Law 12-211, the “Fiscal Year 1999 Budget Support Temporary Amendment Act of 1998,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-773. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 22, 1998, and October 22, 1998, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 5, 1998, it was assigned Act No. 12-512 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-211 became effective on April 13, 1999.
